name: Pre-sql
value:
select case when val = 0 then val/0 else val end as monthly_check
from
(
SELECT NVL(val,0) as val from
(
select count(*) as val from cdp_ods.sisaxis_cierres WHERE CESTADO = 1 AND ctipo = 30 and extract(year from fcierre) = 
case when extract(month from sysdate)='01' then (extract(year from sysdate))-1 
	 else extract(year from sysdate) end and 
extract(month from fcierre)= 
case when extract(month from sysdate)='01' then 12
         else (extract(month from sysdate))-1 end 
)chk
)chk1
